name: Agile Strike
desc: A standard attack by an NPC.
effect: Make a _Major Attack_.

name: Basic Strike
desc: You move forward with a weapon, striking a nearby foe.
effect:
Choose one:
* Make 1 _Major Attack_ and 1 _Minor Attack_.
* Make 3 _Minor Attacks_.
special: You may use any _Gambit_ with a 1 _Momentum_ discount this _Turn_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Make one less _Light_/_Versatile_ _Minor Attack_ and one more _Light_/_Versatile_ _Major Attack_.

name: Butterfly Road
desc: You move with fluid grace, slipping past foes in an elegant dance.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. Attacks against you take a -2 _Penalty_ this _Turn_. At the end of your first _Move_ inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 in a _Burst_ 1. At the end of the second, inflict _Exposed_ 1 in a _Burst_ 1. At the end of the third, inflict _Reeling_ 1 in a _Burst_ 1. You must move at least one space during each Move this turn.
special: Any creature that uses a Reaction on you triggered by you creating an _Opening_ due to starting Movement gains _Impaired_ 1.

name: Call the Pack
desc: You command your allies with practiced precision, coordinating a synchronized strike.
effect: Make a _Minor Attack_, then choose two allies. They gain a _Free Turn_ that they may use to _Step_ towards the target of your Attack and make a _Minor Attack_ against the same creature as you. If all three Attacks _Graze_+, inflict _Reeling_ 1, or _Reeling_ 2 on a _Hit_+.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, your ally makes a _Major Attack_ on the _Free Turn_. Your ally may contribute to this _Boost_. You may repeat this _Boost_.

name: Coiling Strike
desc: You become a tightly-wound spring, ready to lunge out at the first foe foolish enough to enter your range.
effect: Choose a _Melee_ _Major Attack_. Create a _Burst_ X _Hazard_ and become _Charging_, where X is your _Step_ distance + the _Reach_ of the Attack. Whenever you end a _Phase_ while _Charging_ (excluding the initial _Phase_ where this Technique was used), increase the size of the _Hazard_ by 1, up to your _Reposition_ distance. Whenever a creature ends their _Turn_ in the _Hazard_ or enters it you may immediately end _Charging_. You may _Reposition_ towards them, then make a _Major Attack_ against them with _Advantage_. When calculating _Speed Penalties_, add the number of _Phases_ you were charging to the current _Phase_.
boost: 1 _AP_, 2 _Momentum_: After removing the _Hazard_ and making this Attack, repeat the _Effect_.

name: Eager Spires
desc: You seize the earth within an area, causing vicious jagged bursts of sharp stone to erupt unpredictably.
effect: Create a _Blast_ 1 _Hazard_ within Range. At the end of each _Phase_ (excluding this one), choose an _Earthen_ space within the _Hazard_. Apply the _Jagged_ effect to the creature in that space, then make the space _Jagged_. If the space was already _Jagged_, instead apply the effect twice.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, create a _Blast_ 2 _Hazard_. When you create the _Hazard_, immediately trigger the end of _Phase_ effect twice. You must choose two different spaces.

name: Eyes of Greed
desc: You carefully scan the battlefield, finding opportunities for allies wherever you look.
effect:
Roll 1d6 5 times, then place 5 Weapons, based on the individual dice rolls and following rules:
* You may place these anywhere within _Range_, but may not place them adjacent to yourself or allies or within 3 spaces of another _Improvised Weapons_ placed by this effect.
* On a 1-3, the Weapon is a _Small Improvised_ Weapon, made of the same material as the _Terrain_ or an adjacent _Obstacle_. It deals your choice of _Crush_, _Slash_, or _Stab_ damage.
* On a 4+, you may place a _Medium Improvised Weapon_.
* On a 6, you may choose _Wood_, _Metal_, or _Natural_ for the material.
special: All Weapons placed by this have the _Opportune_ and _Fragile_ keywords. Only you and your allies may use these Weapons.

name: Fumigate
desc: A massive blast of chemical gas.
effect: Create a _Burst_ 1 or _Cone_ 3 _Hazard_, then begin _Charging_. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove the _Hazard_ and attack all creatures in the _Area_ three times with _Toxic Spray_, ignoring its normal range. Those spaces become _Toxic Gas_ until the end of the _Round_.

name: Guide the Flock
desc: You find a path forward for your allies, providing them a great deal of mobility.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. All allies within Range gain a _Free Turn_ where they may _Reposition_. Enemies adjacent to you treat all allied Movement on these _Free Turns_ as [_Safe_].
special: As a part of this Technique, designate a _Blast_ 1 within _Range_. Any ally that ends their _Free Turn_ in this Area gains 1 _Momentum_.

name: Hostile Strike
desc: A basic NPC strike.
effect:
Choose one:
* Make 1 _Major Attack_.
* Make 2 _Minor Attacks_.

name: Isolating Manuever
desc: You engage a foe in single combat, limiting their ability to engage your allies.
effect:
Make a _Melee_ _Major Attack_, adding _Marked_ and _Slide_ 3. Immediately after inflicting the _Slide_, you must Move 3 but must end this Movement adjacent to the original Target. If neither you nor the target have a creature adjacent to you, you become _Marked_ by the target. While you are both _Marked_:
* Neither of you may remove or change the target of your _Marked_ by any means, or inflict _Marked_ on other creatures.
* You may not willingly move away from your Target.
* You and the Target have _Disadvantage_ on all attacks not against a _Marked_ target.

This effect ends when you or the target is _Defeated_ or they _Recover_ while not adjacent to you and expend 4 _Poise_. If this effect ends, immediately remove both _Marked_.

name: Lion's Roar
desc: You loudly charge forth into battle, making your intentions clear.
effect: Gain _Vigor_ 2. Make a _Major Attack_. Immediately after resolving the Attack grant _Courageous_ 1 allies of your choice in a _Burst_ 2, or _Courageous_ 2 on a _Crit_ or if you defeat the foe.
special:
An ally that received _Courageous_ gains a _Free Turn_ where they may do one of the following:
* Make a _Minor Attack_ against an enemy _Marked_ by you.
* _Step_ towards you.

name: Ocean's Veil
desc: You pull forth water to create a great wall, warding your allies from assault.
effect: _Draw_ up to 4 within _Range_. Choose X contiguous spaces within _Range_, where X is amount you _Drew_. Inflict _Soaked_, _Slide_ 1 on all creatures in these spaces, then create a _Water Veil_ in each space. You must _Slide_ these creatures into a space that is not targeted by this Technique. These _Water Veil_s are _Destroyed_ when the _Enchant_ ends.

name: Overwatch
desc: You take a position with a pristine view, preparing to lay down supporting fire for allies.
effect: Resolve your Move, inflict _Insight_ 1 on all creatures of your choice in the _Area_, then draw a _Hazard_ there. Until you leave this space or the end of the _Round_, you may trigger _Opportunity Attack_ whenever a creature within this _Hazard_ creates an _Opening_.
special: You may reduce the Area to Cone to 9, 6, or 3; if you do, you may inflict an additional 1/2/4 _Insight_, distributed among creatures in the _Area_ as you wish.

name: Patient Strike
desc: You carefully line up an attack, waiting for the opportune moment to release it.
effect: Choose a creature within Range and inflict _Insight_ 1 on them, then choose a _Major Attack_ and becoming _Charging_. If it's a _Weapon Attack_ that _Weapon_ becomes _Occupied_. At the end of any _Turn_ or _Phase_ you may make choose to stop _Charging_ and unleash the _Attack_ on the target creature. _At the end of each _Phase_ you do not make this Attack, not including the _Phase_ where you began the effect, inflict _Insight_ 1 on that creature.
special: When you resolve this _Attack_, do not roll 2d6. Instead, roll 1d6+X, where X is the number of _Phases_ you have been _Charging_, up to a maximum of 6. If you have _Advantage_/_Disadvantage_ on this Attack, roll 2d6+X and resolve with the higher/lower dice, as appropriate.

name: Raging Stampede
desc: You let out a mighty bellow before you unleash a series of devastating attacks.
effect: Resolve your Move, then make a _Charged Attack_, adding [_Glancing_]. After resolving the _Charged Attack_, immediately make another _Charged Attack_, adding [_Glancing_].
special: You must use a _Heavy_ _Major Attack_ for this.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: You may instead use a _Versatile_ _Major Attack_. You must pay this _Boost_ for each _Charged Attack_.
* 2 _Momentum_: Immediately after resolving the second _Charged Attack_, make another _Charged Attack_, adding [_Glancing_].
* 2 _Momentum_/1 _AP_ (paid after making a _Charged Attack_): Take a _Free Turn_ where you may _Step_ before making your next _Charged Attack_.

name: Roiling Earth
desc: A minor earthquake, firing earth upward and testing the footing of all involved.
effect: Attack [_Avoidable_, _Groundsource_] all Targets in the Area with this Technique's Profile. Any _Prone_ creatures in the _Area_ take 2 Crush Damage [_Avoidable_] on a _Hit_+.
boost:
Choose any number:
* 1 _Momentum_: Make 3 spaces in the _Area_ _Rough_. You may repeat this _Boost_.
* 1 _AP_: After resolving this Attack, create a _Hazard_ in the Area. At the end of the _Round_, resolve this Attack once again and remove the _Hazard_. While the _Hazard_ persists, treat all _Earthen_ Terrain as _Rough_.

name: Safe Haven
desc: You adopt a defensive stance and prepare to offer you guard to your allies.
effect:
You and an adjacent ally may _Recover_, reduce _Reeling_ by 1, and gain 3 _Vigor_. At the end of this _Turn_ gain the following benefits until the end of the _Round_:
* Whenever you use a _Reaction_ on an ally treat your _Reeling_ value as half its current value.
* Attacks against your allies that pass through your space are always at least _Heavily Obstructed_.
* You may allow adjacent allies to use your _Defenses_ when they are Attacked.
* Each _Turn_ you may gain a single _Fleeting_ _Defense_ of your choice that may only be used to _Negate_.

name: Skulk
desc: You conceal yourself before sliding across the battlefield, .
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. You become _Veiled_. This effect remains until you leave the space you ended this _Turn_ in, deal _Damage_, or inflict _Status_.
special: If you use _Ambush_ this _Round_ you may either make a _Light_/_Versatile_ _Major Attack_ instead of a _Minor Attack_ or make an additional _Light_/_Versatile_ _Minor Attack_.

name: Song of Victory
desc: You encourage your allies, helping them to find the strength to push forward.
effect: Grant yourself _Joyful_/_Courageous_ 1, then distribute _Joyful_/_Courageous_ 6, split among allies of your choice within Range. Any creature may reduce the _Joyful_/_Courageous_ by 2 to immediately gain a _Free Turn_. On this _Turn_ they may _Step_ if they reduced _Joyful_ or make a _Minor Attack_ if they reduced _Courageous_. Any ally that you give _Joyful_/_Courageous_ to (even if they use it for something else) gains 2 _Vigor_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may distribute an additional 1 _Joyful_/_Courageous_. You may repeat this _Boost_ up to 4 times.

name: Dance of a Thousand Stings
desc: You dart across the battlefield, unleashing a serious of swift strikes.
effect: After each Movement, make a _Minor Attack_. Any Attacks you make this _Turn_ cause the Target to treat your remaining Movement this _Turn_ as [_Safe_] on a _Hit_+. If you move at least 2 spaces before making an Attack, deal +1 _Bonus Damage_ and add _Vulnerable_ 1.
special: If each Attack this _Turn_ targets unique Targets, gain 1 _Momentum_.

name: Stone Edge
desc: You tear forth a slab of earth, flinging it with horrific force.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, create a _Boulder_ as a part of this _Technique_. There must be at least one _Earthen_ space within _Range_ to use this _Boost_.

name: Strong Strike
desc: You unleash a powerful attack against a foe.
effect:
Choose one:
* Make a _Heavy_ _Major Attack_, adding [_Pierce_ 1] and dealing additional _Bonus Damage_ equal to half the _Phase_ on a _Graze_+.
* Resolve your _Movement_, then make a _Charged Attack_. You must use a _Heavy_ _Major Attack_ for this.
special: Determine _Speed Penalties_ for all _Attacks_ made as a part of this _Technique_ as if it was one _Phase_ earlier.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Instead, you may make a _Versatile_/_Heavy_ _Major Attack_.
* 2 _Momentum_: If you are _Charging_, add [_Unblockable_, _Overwhelming_ 1] and deal +1 _Bonus Damage_ on a _Graze_+. Remove the _Charging_ and _Hazard_ one _Phase_ later.

name: Swift Strike
desc: You agilely attack with light weapons, rapidly covering ground and making a series of strikes.
effect:
Choose one:
* Make 1 _Light_/_Versatile_ _Major Attack_ and 1 _Light_/_Versatile_ _Minor Attack_ in any order.
* Make 3 _Light_/_Versatile_ _Minor Attacks_.
special: Determine _Speed Penalties_ for _Light_ Attacks as if this _Technique_ was played one _Phase_ later.
boost:
* 1 _Momentum_: Instead, determine _Speed Penalties_ for _Light_/_Versatile_ Attacks as if this _Technique_ was played one _Phase_ later.
* 2 _Momentum_: Make one additional _Light_/_Versatile_ _Minor Attack_.

name: Trampling Charge
desc: You run forward, slamming through all foes in your path.
effect:
Choose one:
* You have +1 _Guard_ this _Turn_. Resolve your _Movement_. When you end your _Movement_, make a single _Melee_ _Major Attack_. If the target of the Attack is in-line with your _Movement_, either inflict _Forceful Push_ X or inflict X additional _Bonus Damage_, where X is half the number of spaces you Moved before resolving the effect.
* Do not resolve your _Movement_ yet. Create a _Hazard_ in an adjacent space, become _Charging_, then end your _Turn_. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove _Charging_ and resolve the first effect, but you must move through the space marked by the _Hazard_, removing the _Hazard_ when you do so. You have _Advantage_ on all [_Body_] Attacks and may choose both options for your _Major Attack_ at the end of the _Movement_. If you are moved by any means before removing _Charging_, move the _Hazard_ with you.
special: You may use _Overrun_ at no cost when resolving the effect.
